description: This Dart source file defines an OpenAIService class that interacts with OpenAI's API to perform image-to-text (OCR-like) and image generation tasks. It manages API authorization, constructs HTTP requests, and processes API responses to provide high-level methods for these services.

classes.name: OpenAIService
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with OpenAI's API for image-to-text and image generation, handling authentication and network requests.

methods.name: imageToText
methods.description: Sends an image URL or base64 data to OpenAI's vision model to extract embedded text content.

methods.name: generateImage
methods.description: Generates an image based on a prompt using OpenAI's Image API.
